heading: Car Placeholders
description: These are Placeholders relating to the Player's current vehicle.

placeholders.description: The current fuel gauge of the Car, coloured to display how much fuel is remaining. The presentation is configurable in the strings.yml
The current speed of the Vehicle. The speed will be calculated based on the vehicles base speed with any modifiers applied.
The amount of fuel remaining in the Vehicle.
The total amount of fuel the Vehicle can store.
The name of the current car type.
